modShortDescription: Rather than looting or scrapping, you can now craft Steel Tool Parts with 5 Steel and 2 Mechanical parts.
modDescription:
Rather than looting or scrapping, you can now craft Steel [Tool](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) Parts with 5 Steel and 2 Mechanical parts.

**[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/90nfqmq0ide0mkr/Unsocial_CraftableSteelToolParts.zip/file)**
